insert into t_buildingSaleInfo (buildingSaleInfoId, totalSaledNumber, buildingAvgPrice, saledParklotNumber, saledParklotPrice, occupancyRate, deliveryRate, saledShopsNumber, saledShopsArea, shopsPrice, shopsRent, buildingId) values (#{buildingsaleinfoid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalsalednumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{buildingavgprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{saledparklotnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{saledparklotprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{occupancyrate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deliveryrate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{saledshopsnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{saledshopsarea,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{shopsprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{shopsrent,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{buildingid,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update t_buildingSaleInfo set totalSaledNumber = #{totalsalednumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, buildingAvgPrice = #{buildingavgprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, saledParklotNumber = #{saledparklotnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, saledParklotPrice = #{saledparklotprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, occupancyRate = #{occupancyrate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, deliveryRate = #{deliveryrate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, saledShopsNumber = #{saledshopsnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, saledShopsArea = #{saledshopsarea,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, shopsPrice = #{shopsprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, shopsRent = #{shopsrent,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, buildingId = #{buildingid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where buildingSaleInfoId = #{buildingsaleinfoid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select buildingSaleInfoId, totalSaledNumber, buildingAvgPrice, saledParklotNumber, saledParklotPrice, occupancyRate, deliveryRate, saledShopsNumber, saledShopsArea, shopsPrice, shopsRent, buildingId from t_buildingSaleInfo where buildingSaleInfoId = #{buildingsaleinfoid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
